website_summaries.verdict: If you want a perfume that lingers, this Versace classic won't disappoint – unless you get a batch that isn't up to par.
pros: An alluring fragrance that combines citrus and floral notes with earthy tones
cons: A few reports of bottles with scents that didn't match consumers' expectations
Higher priced with less product that others on our list, but a little goes a long way

customer_reviews.title: Another Italian masterpiece...you will not be disappointed!! 🌹
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! Another wonderful scent from Versace! Not too heavy but you know you’re wearing a great fragrance. This is my favorite designer but I’m also in love with Moschino...the bottle with the Italian flag on the ribbon...Italy seems to have the best perfumes for my buck.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Favorite perfume!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite perfume and it’s such a great price here on amazon. I was nervous i would get a knock off but it was authentic will be buying another when I run out! It’s a very glamours perfume that’s the only way I can describe it!
customer_reviews.author: Sabine

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smell right.
customer_reviews.text: I'm confused because this doesn't smell anything like the original one I tried at a store. I did an online comparison and it doesn't seem to be counterfeit. It doesn't seem that I am allowed to return it either. I don't know what to do or why this doesn't smell right.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This smells extremely sexual seductive like a slow walk in the moonlight it is beautiful ...
customer_reviews.text: This smells extremely sexual seductive like a slow walk in the moonlight it is beautiful it is tempting it is Tim Tatian it’s self smells so wonderful he decadent
customer_reviews.author: CHICKA704

customer_reviews.title: Fresh scent, invigorating
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful box! I like the scent but it doesn’t seem to last on me long.
customer_reviews.author: Lompocwoman

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I got it from my son as a gift for Mother's day. And everyone loves my smell . Brought it 2 times for friend they want it..very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Torres

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I received a small sample of this from Macy’s and loved it. This however, smells nothing like it and gives me a headache - so sorry I tried to save a few $$$. This was a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Darleen Schweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what is shown. It’s a knock off version of the real perfume. Do not believe the other reviews they have been bought
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake!
customer_reviews.text: This is not autentic. The perfume I got smells nothing like the original. I just threw away my money.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian S.

customer_reviews.title: A very good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is how my wife described it "This one stands out and will be the first one to be worn on any day".
customer_reviews.author: Dipankar

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for something different, and this fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: The scent lasts and lasts. My lady is very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Heinbaugh

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t smell like the original but it still smells good. I would recommend you buy from the official website or a department store.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Not the same scent!
customer_reviews.text: Dont be cheap! Dont waste your money. This stuff smells nothing like the real scent. I am really disappointed. It doesn't even smell good to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells nothing like VERSACE Eros.
customer_reviews.text: This is not an authentic product. Smells nothing like VERSACE Eros. Not even a good knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The scent and value
customer_reviews.text: One of the most beautiful scents that I love. The brand is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Pennie Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Perfume
customer_reviews.text: It was a real good deal. Used it for personal use not a gift
customer_reviews.author: Devin VanGorp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Even though I meant to buy the men's cologne the women's Purfume is nice
customer_reviews.author: Dodie Gerg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved it and I think it smells very nice
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this perfume. The size of the bottle was truly a great buy! Smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had a bottle of this and it was running ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a bottle of this and it was running out which is why I purchased it however, it doesn't smell the same..not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Formula in the Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I was at a perfume store yesterday and saw this in store so got curious and this perfume I ordered is the opposite of what the actual perfume smells like. This reminds me of a spicy sensual smell while the real formula smells like a sweet jellybean scent. It smells ok but nothing like the real version!!!! Did NOT get what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: No good quality
customer_reviews.text: It is a fake perfum, definitely is not the same.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute fake - smells horrendous. NOTHING like the authentic version.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M. Rupert

customer_reviews.title: because this product not only came 100% sealed in original packaging but it smells JUST LIKE the sample I got from Sephora
customer_reviews.text: Whoever is saying that this product is not "authentic" is 100% wrong. I don't typically write reviews but this really bothered me enough to take my time to leave my feed back. I was hesitant to buy it because of the reviews but I figured it's one heck a deal if it's real. Thank god I did, because this product not only came 100% sealed in original packaging but it smells JUST LIKE the sample I got from Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Karma STL

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The scent is nothing like the paper tester. It is not a sweet scent, but rather a harsh scent.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P. Snyder
